name: S2019 Mixed Deal
description:
You've been captured by space pirates!  Use your wits and your deck of abilities to battle your way to freedom!  As you progress, you'll find powerful cards and daunting enemies.  Don't worry, if you die, you can respawn at the last checkpoint.

Instructions

In the map view, click arrows to move from room to room

In combat, click a card in your hand to play it

Swap cards in your deck using the deck button on the map view

Defeat pirate bosses to progress to the next level

Credits

Nicholas Kettler, Brice Smith, and George Vo

All sprites are custom made.

The audio files can be found at following links:
